019408f7-772f-70ee-9a69-2d8289644a12.name: conference badge
019408f7-772f-70ee-9a69-2d8289644a12.description: This is your DistrictCon badge. It gets you access to all the great content, villages, interactions, and social activities at DistrictCon Zero! On the back, you see your handle and attendee code: {{handle}}:{{code}}

use.value: You flash your badge to the people around you. They seem mildly impressed.

01942807-cdf2-74d7-8ad2-aa3c271ddee5.name: venue map
01942807-cdf2-74d7-8ad2-aa3c271ddee5.description: A map of the DistrictCon venue within the *Yours Truly Hotel*. On the ground level is the lobby and registration desk, as well as the *Mercy Me* bar and restaurant, site of the after party! Downstairs is the *conference center* where the *main stage*, *policy room*, and *village of villages* is located along with the sponsors. There are also restrooms down there and the staff room.

01944d5d-2035-708c-b913-f7be18c0cb7a.name: staff usb drive
01944d5d-2035-708c-b913-f7be18c0cb7a.description: There's no label, but you never know, there could be something interesting on it. You could try to *use* it.

019456e1-5ff7-7425-8ebc-062a462fe6db.name: DC Metro Map
019456e1-5ff7-7425-8ebc-062a462fe6db.description: A guide to all of the metro stations in the Washington, DC area. You can *use* this map to read it.

01945c7c-e588-76de-8fb5-65e57f5b30ee.name: Som records hint
alternates: som records back room password hint
01945c7c-e588-76de-8fb5-65e57f5b30ee.description:
r00s3v3lt gave you a hint to the password for Som Records back room: 17 8 2 29 30 10 16 6 32 22 11
You met him in the bagel shop wher he said: "Hey new friend, have you made it over to Som records yet? They have the ultimate disco vinyl collection, biggest you've ever seen, some of it basically brand new! Always so much fun."

01945c61-c10c-7788-b7e7-da82b5270751.name: DisCo soundtrack
01945c61-c10c-7788-b7e7-da82b5270751.description: A vinyl record of the DistrictCon soundtrack.

019484b4-6223-75e1-8c19-91ce155f4514.name: application log file
019484b4-6223-75e1-8c19-91ce155f4514.description: Winnona asked you to look over this log file. You'll need to *use* it get the data

019484b6-9be4-705e-bc49-a67260a268f4.name: leetBeats number
019484b6-9be4-705e-bc49-a67260a268f4.description: You got leetBeats' mobile number... just in case you need their services.

use.value: They didn't pick up. Maybe that was a burner.

01948551-c92b-7324-b951-14b6d5d1fced.name: jakerella's challenge coin
01948551-c92b-7324-b951-14b6d5d1fced.description: A over-sized challenge coin with a picture of a stuffed tiger on one side and the DistrictCon logo on the other. Around the outside of the tiger-side it says 'So long, and thanks for all the fish.'

0185e0d6-c1eb-737e-8546-4eeb34ae2e93.name: Halvar's memory-safe sticker
0185e0d6-c1eb-737e-8546-4eeb34ae2e93.description: You turn the item over a couple of times, yep, it's a sticker.

use.value: You peel off the backing of the sticker and slap it on your laptop. 'That looks reeeeaaal niiiice,' you say loudly to yourself. Other people look at you strangely, but you don't care.

0171b8b7-6eb3-7688-8cc6-e9345e870135.name: DisCo Web Code
0171b8b7-6eb3-7688-8cc6-e9345e870135.description: You found the DisCo game code! Well, you found the easy part, anyway.

01815efb-16d4-7e6a-871b-1f03d7dd007c.name: DisCo Server Code
01815efb-16d4-7e6a-871b-1f03d7dd007c.description: You found the DisCo game server code! Well done... but now what will you do with it?

01743c40-5e69-7c06-ad72-a5d168075279.name: Level 1 Social Network Coin
01743c40-5e69-7c06-ad72-a5d168075279.description: A small, bronze coin with a spider web-looking graphic on one side and the words 'Socially Inclined' on the other.

0183fd5b-1009-7086-8c35-f1495d067b3d.name: Level 2 Social Network Coin
0183fd5b-1009-7086-8c35-f1495d067b3d.description: A moderately-sized, silver coin with a neural net graphic on one side and the words 'Social Butterfly' on the other.

018966db-fde3-70b4-9f0a-077394462fba.name: Level 3 Social Network Coin
018966db-fde3-70b4-9f0a-077394462fba.description: A large, gold coin with a colorful enamel inlayed graphic on one side depicting the interconnectivity of society. On the reverse is the full color DisctrictCon logo and around the edge are the words 'DistrictCon Social Ambassador'.

01722dfb-8da9-745d-85bf-be3b4e3c8bbf.name: Encrypted JTW file
01722dfb-8da9-745d-85bf-be3b4e3c8bbf.description: This is the encrypted data file you got from RoRo in the Jump the Wall room. You can *use* it to see the data.

018b86aa-07e1-7b73-8416-0825a12d2fd3.name: Decrypted JTW file
018b86aa-07e1-7b73-8416-0825a12d2fd3.description: You were able to decrypt the file! You can *use* it to see the contents

017477a4-e776-7c13-a066-166e870d627c.name: DisctrictCon Zero Sticker
017477a4-e776-7c13-a066-166e870d627c.description: This is the official DistrictCon sticker. It has a blue background and pink cherry blossom accents. It's in the shape of the number zero and has the name of the conference in the center of the zero.

01794855-f57f-7920-9fac-ac24d0a12cbf.name: Stale bagel
01794855-f57f-7920-9fac-ac24d0a12cbf.description: This bagel is rock hard. You're not sure you could eat it, but maybe you'll need to hammer some nails later?

use.value: You pull out the stale bagel and consider, for a moment, the cost of the dental repair if you eat it. Maybe you should get a fresh one.

01795eff-b2c3-749d-84bc-a639917c7b90.name: Tasty bagel
01795eff-b2c3-749d-84bc-a639917c7b90.description: You bought this bagel at Call Your Mother. It is absolutely delicious, and looks much better than that stale bagel you saw on a table.

use.value: You take a small bite of the fresh bagel and savor it. Maybe you'll save the rest for later.

01711f07-f5ed-760c-a8db-205c49827a94.name: Village of Villages coin
01711f07-f5ed-760c-a8db-205c49827a94.description: You got this coin from the DisCo Policy room moderator. It has a bunch of different policy village logos on one side and the DisCo logo on the other.

017a2ec9-942f-71bf-9b5c-7eebc812eb8b.name: Village of Villages sticker
017a2ec9-942f-71bf-9b5c-7eebc812eb8b.description: You picked up this sticker from one of the village tables. It has all of the logos on it!

018aa024-b107-7da3-91ee-51cc6fd297e4.name: Server Key
018aa024-b107-7da3-91ee-51cc6fd297e4.description: You combined some things you found laying around to get this server key. It's an odd shape, you aren't sure what sort of room that might fit.

018b47aa-5937-7a58-ab5d-a766171f8038.name: Node.js Sticker
018b47aa-5937-7a58-ab5d-a766171f8038.description: Jakerella gave you this sticker for finding the code to this game!

01947476-3cce-7d99-808b-8cb62f505575.name: Hand mic
01947476-3cce-7d99-808b-8cb62f505575.description: You picked this up in the Junkyard room. You probably should take it somewhere.

0192f6eb-5ffa-7cf5-9a2e-a40f8b5d5c1f.name: Thor's favor
0192f6eb-5ffa-7cf5-9a2e-a40f8b5d5c1f.description: Thor owe's you one for running around to find that extra mic.

use.value: You think about how Thor might be able to pay you back, but come up empty for now.
